fullDescription.intro:
Retrieve and count the articles citing a given article. Can be used to find the best articles for a given subject.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Shall we display the PMID citing a given article ?

ports.inPort: A table containing a pubmed identifier PMID
ports.outPort: Appends the dcount the articles citing the given article
